Your text message could not be sent. IKARUS mobile.security blocked your message.
Please choose your personal IKARUS password, which you need to use theft-protection features:
Test full version for 30 days for free
The feature is disabled because the device has no telephony feature.

Remote Control & Theft Protection

IKARUS mobile.security offers features to control your device even if it is lost or stolen:

Using simple text message commands sent from any other mobile phone, you can locate or lock your device, wipe out your personal data or raise an alarm. If you activate this feature, you may be asked to grant IKARUS mobile.security some additional system rights.

"

Remote Control Summary

Your device is now theft-protected via remote control. You can send one of the following messages to the stolen device's phone number:

  • wipe:password - The device will be reset to factory settings and all data on it (music, photos, videos and other personal files) will be deleted.
  • lock:password - The device will be blocked immediately.
  • locate:password - The device will be located immediately â€“ you will receive the coordinates as a Google Maps link.
  • alarm:password - An alarm sound will be played.

If you lock your device, then you must enter the IKARUS password to unlock it.

"

Setup complete

IKARUS mobile.security is ready to use.

Do you want to scan your device now?

Text Message Blacklist

The text message blacklist offers SPAM protection for your phone or tablet:

Text messages from blacklisted phone numbers are automatically deleted. Choose phone numbers from the address book or from recently received messages.

USSD Protection

IKARUS mobile.security offers USSD protection. This protection prevents the execution of USSD control codes that can harm your device or render it unusable. USSD codes look like phone numbers but instead execute code on your device. You may even unintentionally execute a dangerous USSD code by clicking on a seemingly harmless link on a web page in your browser.

URL Filter

The URL filter protects you against dangerous web sites in the Internet.

The filter warns you when you try to access harmful sites that are known for phishing or hosting malware.

All settings have been completed.

IKARUS mobile.security is ready to use.

Do you want to scan your device now?

IKARUS mobile.security
Setup Wizard

Welcome to IKARUS mobile.security! This setup wizard will guide you through the installation of the software and assist you to configure the following features:

  • USSD Protection
  • Theft Protection
  • Text Message Blacklist
  • URL Filter
  • Initial Scan

Click \"Next\" to use the wizard!

IKARUS mobile.security
Setup Wizard

Welcome to IKARUS mobile.security! This setup wizard will guide you through the installation of the software and assist you to configure the following features:

  • Theft Protection
  • Text Message Blacklist
  • URL Filter
  • Initial Scan

Click \"Next\" to use the wizard!

IKARUS mobile.security
Setup Wizard

  • URL Filter
  • Initial Scan

Click \"Next\" to use the wizard!

After the test phase, you can buy a license or use the basic features of the free version."

The text message blacklist offers SPAM protection for your phone or tablet. Text messages from blacklisted phone numbers are automatically deleted. Choose phone numbers from the address book or from recently received messages.

"Thank you for choosing IKARUS mobile.security. On the next pages, we will explain all important features of the app and allow you to configure some settings.
If you wish to configure the settings later, click \"Skip\". To start the configuration wizard, click \"Next\"."

"Thank you for choosing IKARUS mobile.security. On the next pages, we will explain all important features of the app and allow you to configure some settings.
If you wish to configure the settings later, click \"Skip\". To start the configuration wizard, click \"Next\"."

"Have you lost your phone or tablet, or was it stolen from you? Not a problem if you use IKARUS mobile.security â€“ Using simple text message commands sent from any other mobile phone, you can locate or lock your device, wipe out your personal data or raise an alarm.
If you activate this feature, you may be asked to grant IKARUS mobile.security some additional system rights."
Do you want to enable remote control?

"

Your device is now theft-protected via remote control. You can send one of the following messages to the stolen device's phone number:

  • lock:password - The device will be blocked immediately.
  • locate:password - The device will be located immediately, and you will receive the coordinates as a Google Maps link.
  • alarm:password - The device will be blocked and an alarm sound will be played.
  • wipe:password - The device will be reset to factory settings and all data on it (music, photos, videos and other personal files) will be deleted.

If you lock your device, then you must enter the IKARUS password to unlock it.

Example: Your IKARUS password is abcdef12 and you want to lock your device. Send a message with the following content to your phone number: lock:abcdef12

"
Do you want to enable the message blacklist?

IKARUS mobile.security offers protection against an Android security hole by preventing the execution of USSD control codes that can harm your device or render it unusable. USSD codes look like phone numbers but instead execute code on your device. You may even unintentionally execute a dangerous USSD code by clicking on a seemingly harmless link on a web page in your browser. USSD codes can also damage the SIM card.
Do you want to enable USSD protection?
The URL filter protects you against dangerous web sites in the Internet. It warns you when you try to access harmful sites that are known for phishing or hosting malware.
Do you want to enable the URL filter?
Activate license with no time limit on Google Play
Inform senders that their message was rejected. Choose any text for the automatic reply.
The trial version allows you to test the full feature set for 30 days free of charge and at no obligation.
When purchasing on Google Play, you receive a full version with no time limit which includes all additional security features.
This list shows you which files on your device have been infected by a virus. You can delete the files or send them to the IKARUS laboratory for further analysis.
New or updated apps are monitored in the background. When an app is downloaded or upgraded, a scan is started automatically to check the app for malware.
File access is monitored in the background. Files on the SD card or on the internal storage, such as Internet downloads, are automatically checked for malware.
The password is needed for theft protection. Use it to control your device with text messages. If you lock the device, then you have to enter the password to unlock it.
Send a text message with the line \"alarm:password"\" to the stolen device's phone number. An alarm sound will be played."
Send a text message with the line \"locate:password"\" to the stolen device's phone number. The device will be located immediately â€“ you will receive the coordinates as a Google Maps link."
Send a text message containing the line \"lock:password"\" to the stolen device's phone number. The device will be blocked immediately."

Send a text message with the line \"wipe:password"\" to the stolen device's phone number. The device will be reset to factory settings and all data on it (music, photos, videos and other personal files) will be deleted."
An app scan covers only the apps installed on the device, while the full scan also scans the memory card. You can also schedule scans.
An app scan covers only the apps installed on the device, while the full scan also scans the memory card.
The anonymous virus statistics help IKARUS quality assurance: The program transmits anonymous data on viruses found to the IKARUS lab.
If the SIM card is removed or replaced, then the device is locked immediately and can only be unlocked by entering the password.
Text messages from blacklisted phone numbers are automatically deleted. Choose phone numbers from the address book or from recently received messages.

Our virus detection mechanism is adapted to the current threat situation and updated with the latest virus definitions on an ongoing basis. Therefore, regular updates - manual or under time control - increase your security.
With activation codes, you can choose between flexible license terms for the upgrade to the full version.
The URL filter warns you when you try to access harmful sites in the Internet that are known for phishing or hosting malware.
The USSD protection prevents the execution of USSD control codes that can harm your device or make it unusable. USSD codes look like phone numbers but instead execute code on your device.

IKARUS mobile.security downloads the current versions of virus scanner, AntiSPAM and database. These components are regularly updated by malware experts in our IKARUS laboratory, ensuring your security.

Warning - Visiting this web site may harm your computer. This page appears to contain malicious code that could be downloaded to your computer without your consent. You can learn more about harmful web content including viruses and other malicious code and how to protect your computer at StopBadware.org.

Warning - Suspected phishing page. This page may be a forgery or imitation of another website, designed to trick users into sharing personal or financial information. Entering any personal information on this page may result in identity theft or other abuse. You can find out more about phishing from www.antiphishing.org.
